value_string.String:
commands=(
    "save software from tftp 192.168.1.10 ssg5ssg20.6.1.0r2.0 to flash"
    "unset all | confirm: yes"
    "reset     | confirm: no yes"
    "exit      | confirm: yes"
)

commands=(
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/2"
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/3"
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/4"
    "unset interface bgroup0 port eth0/6"
    "set zone name Internet"
    "set zone name segment1"
    "set zone name segment2"
    "set zone name segment-tftp"
    "set interface eth0/0 zone segment1"
    "set interface eth0/0 ip 10.0.0.1/24"
    "set interface eth0/1 zone segment2"
    "set interface eth0/1 ip 10.0.1.1/24"
    "set interface eth0/6 zone Internet"
    "set interface eth0/6 ip 192.168.200.1/24"
    "set route 0.0.0.0/0 interface eth0/6 gateway 192.168.200.2"
    "set policy from segment1 to Internet any any ANY nat src permit"
    "exit | confirm: yes"
)

templates.name: inst_initial_server_script
tftp_initial_server_script
provisioner_initial_server_script
telnethop_initial_server_script
environment_template
test_runner_script
templates.template_content:
#!/bin/bash

function loadInstanceIDs() {
  echo "declare -A instances"
  terraform show | egrep -o 'openvdc_instance.[^:]+:' | sed -e 's/openvdc_instance.\([^:]*\):/\1/g' | while read instance_name; do
    instance_id=`terraform show | grep -a1 "openvdc_instance.${instance_name}:" | tail -n1 | awk -F"= " '{print $2}'`
    echo "instances[${instance_name}]=${instance_id}"
  done
}

`loadInstanceIDs`

work_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/network.test"
testcase_dir="${work_dir}/{{.Environment.TestCaseDirectoryName}}"
result_file="${work_dir}/test_result.txt"
log_file="${work_dir}/test_log.txt"

\rm -f ${result_file} ${log_file}

cd ${testcase_dir}

find . -type f -name "*_server.sh" | while read server_script; do
  client_instance_name="`echo ${server_script} | awk -F_ '{print $1}' | sed -e 's/\.\///g'`"
  client_instance_id="${instances[${client_instance_name}]}"
  server_instance_name="`echo ${server_script} | awk -F_ '{print $3}'`"
  server_instance_id="${instances[${server_instance_name}]}"
  accessibility="`echo ${server_script} | awk -F_ '{print $5}'`"
  if [ "${accessibility}" == "allow" ]; then
    accessibility="Allow"
  else
    accessibility="Deny"
  fi
  protocol="`echo ${server_script} | awk -F_ '{print $4}'`"
  prefixResult="${client_instance_name}_to_${server_instance_name}_${protocol}"
  prefix="`echo ${server_script} | awk -F'_server' '{print $1}'`"
  echo "----- ${prefix} -----" | tee -a ${log_file}
  client_script="${prefix}_client.sh"
  chmod 755 ${server_script} ${client_script}

  if [ "" == "${server_instance_id}" ]; then
    server_log="skipped because the server is a physical device."
    server_script_result=0
  else
    openvdc wait ${server_instance_id} running
    server_log="`cat ${server_script} | openvdc console ${server_instance_id}`"
    server_script_result=$?
  fi

  echo "+++++ server_log +++++" | tee -a ${log_file}
  echo "${server_log}" | tee -a ${log_file}

  if [ ${server_script_result} -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "${prefixResult},${accessibility},NG" | tee -a ${result_file}
  else
    sleep 2
    openvdc wait ${client_instance_id} running
    if [ "${client_instance_name}" == "inst1" ]; then
      echo "ip route add default via 10.0.0.1" | openvdc console ${client_instance_id} 
    fi
    if [ "${client_instance_name}" == "inst3" ]; then
      echo "ip route add default via 10.0.1.1" | openvdc console ${client_instance_id} 
    fi
    client_log="`cat ${client_script} | openvdc console ${client_instance_id}`"
    client_script_result=$?

    echo "+++++ client_log +++++" | tee -a ${log_file}
    echo "${client_log}" | tee -a ${log_file}

    if [ ${client_script_result} -ne 0 ]; then
      echo "${prefixResult},${accessibility},NG" | tee -a ${result_file}
    else
      echo "${prefixResult},${accessibility},OK" | tee -a ${result_file}
    fi
  fi
  echo "---------------------" | tee -a ${log_file}
done

templates.name: ssh Client TestProgram
ping Client TestProgram
http Client TestProgram
https Client TestProgram
